snippet.title: "There's no dinosaurs" gameplay trailer
snippet.description:
Can you find the dino?

On Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2511450/Theres_No_Dinosaurs/

On #nintendoswitch 

A  charming adventure in our cozy game series, where classic meets modern in a delightful blend of hidden objects, colorful puzzles, and whimsical characters.

 Explore intricate levels filled with surprises like dinosaurs, socks, and Easter eggs, all set in a nostalgic yet fresh cartoon-style 2D world. Test your skills with challenging levels, unlock achievements, and unravel the mysteries in this indie gem that brings a touch of retro charm to the point-and-click genre

Find all of our cozy games: https://store.steampowered.com/curator/44910272
